feature1.explanation: Both texts utilize quotation marks and commas in a similar manner.

feature2.explanation: Both texts display a formal tone with a mix of technical and general vocabulary.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style and absence of spelling errors, along with some similarities in tone and vocabulary, the likelihood that the texts were written by the same author is moderate.
